channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Two British anti-hate speech campaigners sanctioned by US state department – UK politics live
item.description: Imran Ahmed and Clare Melford among five Europeans hit with visa bans over claims they wish to ‘suppress American viewpoints they oppose’ Keir Starmer...

item.title: BP agrees deal to sell £7.4bn stake in Castrol to US investment firm
item.description: Stonepeak will acquire 65% of lubricants business as part of wider plans for the oil company to pay down its debt Business live – latest updates BP ha...

item.title: British boy, 13, stabbed to death in Portugal
item.description: Police say incident a ‘domestic violence situation’ and suspect, who also died, was ex-partner of teenager’s mother A 13-year-old British boy has died...

item.title: U-turn on inheritance tax for farmers ‘snuck out’ to avoid scrutiny, say Tories
item.description: Victoria Atkins says announcement to raise tax threshold from £1m to £2.5m days before Christmas ‘seems very odd’ UK politics live – latest updates Mi...

item.title: Perth man charged with racial harassment for alleged post backing Bondi attack
item.description: Martin Thomas Glynn, 39, was arrested in Yangebup where police allege they found firearms, ammunition and Hamas and Hezbollah flags A man accused of p...

item.title: Does religion have a role to play in sport?
item.description: Athletes and footballers tell us if talking about their faith impacts how they are treated in sport.

item.title: Starmer backs down in farm tax row - but why now?
item.description: A U-turn on inheritance tax plans for farmers raises more questions about political judgement in government.

item.title: Venezuela accuses US of 'extortion' over seizure of oil tankers
item.description: An emergency meeting of the UN Security Council was called to discuss the US seizure of two tankers.

item.title: Zelensky moves towards demilitarised zones in latest peace plan for Ukraine
item.description: On the key question of Ukraine's eastern Donbas, Zelensky says a "free economic zone" is a potential option.

item.title: BP sells stake in motor oil arm Castrol for $6bn
item.description: BP has sold a 65% stake in its motor lubricant arm Castrol to US-based investment firm Stonepeak.
